No.
To
OFFICE OF THE ADDITIONAL DIRECTOR GENERAL/AIRPORT SECTOR
CENTML INDUSTRIAL SECURITY FORCE
(Ministry of Home Affairs)
Administrative Block
CISF Complex, Mahipalpur
By pass road, New Delhi-37
042011/APcloPs(1)/circular(BcAs)/19-316< Datedr<April,2019
IGIAPS-I & II
DISG /AP (NZ, SZ, WZ, and E&NE)
DIG/CASO ASGS Delhi, Mumbai and Chennai
All CASOS of ASGS
Enclosed find herewith a copy of BCAS AVSEC Circular No. 05/2019 foMarded
vide letter No. CAS-7(L2)/20t9lDN-I/Body Scanner (E0152659) dated 08/04/2019.
2. 
BCAS has issued minimum standards/technical specifications, along with an
SOP, for deployment of Body Scanners for screening of persons including
passengers. As per the SOP, Eody Scanners shall be installed at pre_embarkation
security check points. Airport Operators of all the Hypersensitive and Sensitive
airports shall install the Body Scanners, replacing all DFMDS, within one year from
the date of issue of cited Circular, and the other Airport Operators (Normal airports)
shall install Body Scanners, replacing DFN4DS, within two years. Further, at least one
set of DFMD shall be maintained for screening of passengers/persons with medical
conditions.
3. 
As per Para-2 of the SOp, the Standing Committee constituted by BCAS vide
OM dated 29101/2014 (copy enclosed) shall vet and approve the installation of these
equipments. All Zonal DISG and CASOS are directed to liaise with concerned
RDCOS/Regional Director, BCAS, and conduct a joint exercise alongwith BCAS and
Airport Operators to decide the following :-
i) The site for installation of Body Scanners alongwith other relevant equipment
at each of the airport (sufficient space shall be made available before and
after the use of Body Scanner to ensure optimum throughput).
ii) Number of Body Scanners required at each airport for smooth pre-
embarkation security checks in the Security Hold Area.
viation Securi

iii) Tentafive timelines by Airport operators for indallation of Body Scanners'
4. 
All CASos should also identify screeners to be trained in the operation of Body
